data.text: Bano be baana Dawudi be yazaalira mu Kebbulooni:
owookusatu ye yali Abusaalomu gwe yazaala mu Maaka muwala wa Talumaayi kabaka w’e Gesuli;
Owookutaano ye yali Sefatiya, gwe yazaala mu Abitali
Bano omukaaga Dawudi be yazaalira mu Kebbulooni, gye yafugira emyaka musanvu n’emyezi mukaaga.
era bano be baana be yazaalira eyo:
N’abalala baali Ibukali, ne Erisaama, ne Erifereti,
ne Noga, ne Nefegi, ne Yafiya,
ne Erisaama, ne Eriyada, ne Erifereti, bonna awamu mwenda.
Bano bonna be baali batabani ba Dawudi, obutabala batabani be abalala aba bazaana be. Tamali ye yali mwannyinaabwe.
Mutabani wa Sulemaani yali Lekobowaamu,
ne Yolaamu nga ye mutabani wa Yekosafaati,
Amaziya nga ye mutabani wa Yowaasi,
Akazi yali mutabani wa Yosamu,
Amoni yali mutabani wa Manase,
Batabani ba Yosiya baali
Batabani ba Yekoyakimu baali
Abaddirira mu lulyo lwa Yekoniya omuwambe be ba:
ne Malukiramu, ne Pedaya, ne Senazzali, ne Yekamiya, ne Kosama ne Nedabiya.
Batabani ba Pedaya baali
N’abalala abataano be yazaala baali Kasuba, ne Okeri, ne Berekiya, ne Kasadiya ne Yusubukesedi.
Batabani ba Kananiya baali
Ab’olulyo lwa Sekaniya baali
Batabani ba Neyaliya baali
Batabani ba Eriwenayi baali
